code: import findSring from"./findString";import VARIAVEIS_DO_PROCESSO from'../integration/storage.json';export default function changeTaskNumber(taskData,setId){var taskName=taskData===null||taskData===void 0?void 0:taskData.taskName;var buscando=true;var i=1;while(buscando&&i<50){if(findSring(taskName,"".concat(i))){buscando=false;VARIAVEIS_DO_PROCESSO.tarefaAtiva=i;if(setId){setId(i);}}i++;}}
